016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.BuildImageCmd;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.ImageReference;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.InvalidImageReferenceException;
021import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
022import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
024import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
025import io.micronaut.core.annotation.Experimental;
026import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
027import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
028import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
029import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
030import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
031import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
032import org.apache.maven.shared.filtering.MavenFilteringException;
033import org.apache.maven.shared.filtering.MavenReaderFilter;
034import org.apache.maven.shared.filtering.MavenReaderFilterRequest;
035
036import javax.inject.Inject;
037import java.io.File;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.io.InputStream;
040import java.io.InputStreamReader;
041import java.io.Reader;
042import java.io.Writer;
043import java.nio.file.Files;
044import java.nio.file.Path;
045import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
046import java.nio.file.attribute.PosixFilePermission;
047import java.util.Collections;
048import java.util.EnumSet;
049import java.util.Properties;
050import java.util.Set;
051
052/**
053 * <p>Implementation of the <code>docker-crac</code> packaging.</p>
054 * <p><strong>WARNING</strong>: this goal is not intended to be executed directly. Instead, specify the packaging type
055 * using the <code>packaging</code> property, eg:</p>
056 *
057 * <pre>mvn package -Dpackaging=docker-crac</pre>
058 * <p>
059 * This is a two stage process. First a docker image is built that runs the application under a CRaC enabled JDK. Then
060 * the application is warmed up via a shell script. And then a checkpoint is taken via a signal using jcmd.
061 * <p>
062 * The second stage takes this checkpoint, and creates the final image containing it plus a run script which passes the
063 * correct flags to the CRaC enabled JDK.
064 *
065 * @author Tim Yates
066 * @since 3.5.0
067 */
068@Experimental
069@Mojo(name = DockerCracMojo.DOCKER_CRAC_PACKAGING, requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
070public class DockerCracMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
071
072    public static final String DOCKER_CRAC_PACKAGING = "docker-crac";
073    public static final String CHECKPOINT_SCRIPT_NAME = "checkpoint.sh";
074    public static final String WARMUP_SCRIPT_NAME = "warmup.sh";
075    public static final String RUN_SCRIPT_NAME = "run.sh";
076    public static final String DEFAULT_READINESS_COMMAND = "curl --output /dev/null --silent --head http://localhost:8080";
077    public static final String CRAC_READINESS_PROPERTY = "crac.readiness";
078    public static final String DEFAULT_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_TIMEOUT = "60";
079    public static final String CRAC_CHECKPOINT_NETWORK_PROPERTY = "crac.checkpoint.network";
080    public static final String CRAC_CHECKPOINT_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY = "crac.checkpoint.timeout";
081    public static final String DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE = "ubuntu:22.04";
082
083    private static final EnumSet<PosixFilePermission> POSIX_FILE_PERMISSIONS = EnumSet.of(
084            PosixFilePermission.OWNER_READ, PosixFilePermission.OWNER_WRITE, PosixFilePermission.OWNER_EXECUTE,
085            PosixFilePermission.GROUP_READ, PosixFilePermission.GROUP_WRITE, PosixFilePermission.GROUP_EXECUTE,
086            PosixFilePermission.OTHERS_READ, PosixFilePermission.OTHERS_EXECUTE
087    );
088    private final MavenReaderFilter mavenReaderFilter;
089
090    @Parameter(property = DockerCracMojo.CRAC_READINESS_PROPERTY, defaultValue = DockerCracMojo.DEFAULT_READINESS_COMMAND)
091    private String readinessCommand;
092
093    @Parameter(property = DockerCracMojo.CRAC_CHECKPOINT_TIMEOUT_PROPERTY, defaultValue = DockerCracMojo.DEFAULT_CRAC_CHECKPOINT_TIMEOUT)
094    private Integer checkpointTimeoutSeconds;
095
096    @Parameter(property = DockerCracMojo.CRAC_CHECKPOINT_NETWORK_PROPERTY)
097    private String checkpointNetworkName;
098
099    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
100    @Inject
101    public DockerCracMojo(
102            MavenProject mavenProject,
103            JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
104            ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService,
105            DockerService dockerService,
106            MavenReaderFilter mavenReaderFilter
107    ) {
108        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService);
109        this.mavenReaderFilter = mavenReaderFilter;
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
114        try {
115            copyDependencies();
116
117            MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase());
118
119            switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
120                case LAMBDA -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Lambda Functions are currently unsupported");
121                case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> throw new MojoExecutionException("Oracle Functions are currently unsupported");
122                case DEFAULT -> buildDockerCrac();
123                default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
124            }
125        } catch (InvalidImageReferenceException iire) {
126            String message = "Invalid image reference "
127                    + iire.getInvalidReference()
128                    + ", perhaps you should check that the reference is formatted correctly according to " +
129                    "https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/tag/#extended-description" +
130                    "\nFor example, slash-separated name components cannot have uppercase letters";
131            throw new MojoExecutionException(message);
132        } catch (IOException | IllegalArgumentException | MavenFilteringException e) {
133            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
134        }
135    }
136
137    private void buildDockerCrac() throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException, MavenFilteringException {
138        String checkpointImage = buildCheckpointDockerfile();
139        getLog().info("CRaC Checkpoint image: " + checkpointImage);
140        File checkpointDir = new File(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory(), "cr");
141        // We need to make this folder first, or else Docker on linux will make it as root and break clean on CI
142        checkpointDir.mkdirs();
143        dockerService.runPrivilegedImageAndWait(
144                checkpointImage,
145                checkpointTimeoutSeconds,
146                checkpointNetworkName,
147                checkpointDir.getAbsolutePath() + ":/home/app/cr"
148        );
149        buildFinalDockerfile(checkpointImage);
150    }
151
152    private String buildCheckpointDockerfile() throws IOException, MavenFilteringException {
153        String name = mavenProject.getArtifactId() + "-crac-checkpoint";
154        Set<String> checkpointTags = Collections.singleton(name);
155        copyScripts(CHECKPOINT_SCRIPT_NAME, WARMUP_SCRIPT_NAME, RUN_SCRIPT_NAME);
156        File dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_CRAC_CHECKPOINT);
157        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerService.buildImageCmd()
158                .withDockerfile(dockerfile)
159                .withBuildArg("BASE_IMAGE", getFromImage().orElse(DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE))
160                .withTags(checkpointTags);
161        dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
162        return name;
163    }
164
165    private void buildFinalDockerfile(String checkpointContainerId) throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException, MavenFilteringException {
166        Set<String> tags = getTags();
167        for (String tag : tags) {
168            ImageReference.parse(tag);
169        }
170        copyScripts(RUN_SCRIPT_NAME);
171        File dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_CRAC);
172        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerService.buildImageCmd()
173                .withDockerfile(dockerfile)
174                .withBuildArg("BASE_IMAGE", getFromImage().orElse(DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE))
175                .withBuildArg("CHECKPOINT_IMAGE", checkpointContainerId)
176                .withTags(getTags());
177        dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
178    }
179
180    private Properties replacementProperties(String readinessCommand, String mainClass) {
181        Properties properties = new Properties();
182        properties.setProperty("READINESS", readinessCommand);
183        properties.setProperty("MAINCLASS", mainClass);
184        return properties;
185    }
186
187    private void copyScripts(String... scriptNames) throws IOException, MavenFilteringException {
188        File target = new File(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory(), "scripts");
189        if (!target.exists()) {
190            target.mkdirs();
191        }
192        processScripts(target, replacementProperties(readinessCommand, mainClass), scriptNames);
193    }
194
195    private void processScripts(File target, Properties replacements, String... scriptNames) throws IOException, MavenFilteringException {
196        for (String script : scriptNames) {
197            File localOverride = new File(mavenProject.getBasedir(), script);
198            InputStream resourceStream = DockerCracMojo.class.getResourceAsStream("/cracScripts/" + script);
199            Reader resourceReader = resourceStream == null ? null : new InputStreamReader(resourceStream);
200            try (Reader reader = localOverride.exists() ? Files.newBufferedReader(localOverride.toPath()) : resourceReader) {
201                if (reader == null) {
202                    throw new IOException("Could not find script " + script);
203                }
204                MavenReaderFilterRequest req = new MavenReaderFilterRequest();
205                req.setFrom(reader);
206                req.setFiltering(true);
207                req.setAdditionalProperties(replacements);
208                Path outputPath = target.toPath().resolve(script);
209                try (Writer writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(outputPath, StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING)) {
210                    IOUtils.copy(mavenReaderFilter.filter(req), writer);
211                }
212                Files.setPosixFilePermissions(outputPath, POSIX_FILE_PERMISSIONS);
213            }
214        }
215    }
216}
